sentences.sContent: This was an uninformed article and sophomoric in its treatment of the specific technologies.
sentences.sContent_eng: This was an uninformed article and sophomoric in its treatment of the specific technologies.
sentences.sCn: 这是一篇无知的文章，在某些技术问题上一知半解。

synos.tran: 一知半解的；大学或四年制中学的二年级的
